homepage.subtitle: All bodies and experiences are welcome!

quotes.left:
“African dance”? 
Let's celebrate our commonalities and 
respect our differences: 
The art of dancing together.
quotes.right: What happens in the dance ritual is both deeply personal and highly political.
quotes.leftImageAlt: Profile image of a Black man with a beard, calm expression, looking straight ahead toward the woman.
quotes.rightImageAlt: Profile image of a white woman, smiling, looking straight ahead toward the man.
